attributes.action: support the safest measure for motorcyclists, by extending the permitted use of bus lanes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since bus lane use for motorcycles was introduced on a few roads recently, it has become one of the safest measures for riders and passengers to experience.  It's been a god-send for safety plus they do not hold up the other bus lane permitted users.  Please permit all bus lanes to be accessible to motorcycles.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "support the safest measure for motorcyclists, by extending the permitted use of bus lanes."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14912.asp

Prime Minister's Office
